title: Disconnect Bullshit
body: I was in champ select and I got kicked lost 3 LP and then lost a ranked and got demoted. The Fucking Game disconnected me so i deranked

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find a record of any NA service issues today, so I'm not confident that this is caused by League. It sounds like your connection to our matchmaking servers is *unstable*, which could be for a number of different reasons. I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local network settings are compatible with League.

If you run into further issues after taking those steps, let me know.
